overview: A reporter itching to get off the boring gardening "beat" gets a chance to investigate a series of arson fires that have been plaguing the city. He believes the fires are tied into a web of political corruption involving a wealthy businessman, the mayor and the police chief. Complicatins ensue when the girl assigned to help him turns out to be the businessman's daughter.
tagline: Greater in Theme-Drama and Spectacular Production Than All Other Fire Thrilles Combined!
title: Night Alarm
